page.title: 01REVIEW
page.content: This block contains a vast range of urban landscapes from city centre environments to inner suburban that have suffered urban blight, especially in the housing stock and in industrial decline. The city centre is the major regional focus for entertainment, shopping and financial activities. This block contains a tremendous variety of educational establishments e.g. the University of Manchester. It is an interesting area from the point of view of both city centre and central area housing and industry.
